name: Product Advertiser for WooCommerce
author: Hossni Mubarak

sections.description:
Product Advertiser for WooCommerce is a wocommerce plugin which will display product at the bottom right corner when scrolling down. It display the product randomly with the help of ajax call.
The ajax call appears each time you scroll down and the prodcut comes one after one randomly when you stop scrolling.

ðŸŒŸ Plugin Features:

  • Easy to install
  • Fully integrated in WordPress
  • Compatible with WordPress 4.5 and PHP 5.6
  • Display Products randomly
  • Display Product when scroll
  • Parent box border color option
  • Background color option
  • Product title color option
  • Category selection option
  • Easy and fast loading
  • Load Product via Ajax when scrolling down

sections.installation:
Install Product Advertiser for WooCommerce as a regular WordPress plugin. Here are different ways to install plugin:

Install by search plugin:

  1. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  2. Search HM Wc Product Advertiser
  3. Click to install
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Setup the proper settings in WP Scroll Post menu

Install by upload plugin:

  1. Download the latest version of HM Wc Product Advertiser(.zip file)
  2. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  3. Select “Upload Plugin”
  4. Click on “Choose File”
  5. Select downloaded hm-wc-product-advertiser.zip and click on “Install Now” button
  6. Activate the plugin
sections.faq:
I have installed the plugin. What next?

Please go to Product Advertise menu, and apply the settings. In your browser just scroll your mouse and you’ll see random prodcut appears at the bottom right corner.
